author: GameSpot
description:
Though it eventually does become repetitive, its endgame lacks direction, and its strict adherence to the source material is sometimes an Achilles' heel, Dune: Awakening nonetheless manages to carefully mix and match genres to create a Spice Melange cocktail that is hard to put down--at least for the first few dozen hours.

#dune #duneawakening #gamespot #gaming #game #gamereview
title: Dune: Awakening Review
